title: Cookie via innerHTML
description: Reads a q cookie and reflects it with innerHTML. Scripts in the payload won't run directly, so you need an HTML-based gadget.
objectives: Notice that <script> tags placed via innerHTML stay inert.
Find an alternative vector such as an event handler or SVG payload.
Set the q cookie manually to control the reflected content.
hints: Use an element that runs code on load/error, e.g., .
Set the value via DevTools: document.cookie='q=<payload>'.
body:
Cookie -> innerHTML Sink

Set a cookie named q to control the output.
